original_text:
Better is the little that the righteous has
    than the abundance of many wicked.
korean_text: 의인의 적은 소유가 악인의 풍부함보다 낫도다

sentences.original_text: Better is the little that the righteous has
sentences.korean_translation: 의인이 가진 적은 것이 더 낫다

sentences.original_text: than the abundance of many wicked.
